sentences.en: Boys boys boys, With hairspray and denim. Boys boys boys, We love them! We love them!
sentences.cn: 男孩男孩男孩, 配著发胶和单宁. 男孩男孩男孩, 我们爱他们.

sentences.en: Cashmere , fur, high heels and hairspray was the uniform of the day.
sentences.cn: 这一天来宾个个身着羊绒和毛皮衣, 脚蹬高跟鞋,发型考究.

sentences.en: Lee Redmond soaks hers in olive oil Aaron Studham lathers his in hairspray.
sentences.cn: 李·雷德蒙将她的指甲泡在橄榄油里,亚伦·斯图德汉姆用定型水做发型.

sentences.en: Look, under the warning section, It'says this hairspray is flammable.
sentences.cn: 你看, 在注意事项中说,这瓶喷发露是易燃品.

sentences.en: Or maybe finding excessive chlorofluorocarbons (if the aliens all use hairspray).
sentences.cn: 也许这样一来，就能够发现过量的氯氟化碳(如果外星人也使用头发定型剂的话)。

sentences.en: Perhaps she just used too much hairspray and gel.
sentences.cn: 也许她只是用了太多造型液和发胶而已.

sentences.en: Remind me to buy another hairspray when I'm in town, would you?
sentences.cn: 在我进城时提醒我再买一罐喷发定型剂, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: She sprayed hairspray in her eyes by mistake.
sentences.cn: 她错把洗头水喷到眼里去了.

sentences.en: This family - use hairspray has won ladies'favour.
sentences.cn: 这种家用定型发水,深得女界欢心.

sentences.en: We should spray some hairspray on your hair.
sentences.cn: 我们应该喷些发胶在你的头发上.

sentences.en: Would you like me to use some hairspray or mousse?
sentences.cn: 我女朋友总是说我的头发油乎乎的.

sentences.en: Xiao Liu sprayed lots of hairspray on his hair before the date with his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 和女友约会之前,小刘往头发上喷了许多喷发胶.

trans.tran_en: a sticky liquid that you spray on your hair to keep it in place
